item.title: Circular Economy
item.description: There are lots of definitions of the circular economy out there. The way I see it, traditionally, if you bought something and didn’t want it anymore, it was your responsibility to figure out what to do with it. As landfills piled up with trash, polluting the environment and threatening to spillover, you started hearing noises about recycling. Then we came to the wonderful alliterative paradigm - reduce, reuse, and recycle. I’m all for encouraging individuals to play their part in saving the planet.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Fighting the good fight; conquering that mountain, one paragraph a day.
